Kinetic Gem

View source
  • View history
  • Talk (1)
Kinetic Gem
Gem / Rune 3005
Rarity: Rare
Buy Now on Market
Adding this gem to an item will modify or add one or more new animations to the hero equipping the item.
Created By
Released
14 Nov 2013
Origin
Dota 2 Store, Treasures
TRADEABLE
MARKETABLE

Kinetic Gems are a type of gem that can be socketed into hero equipment to grant custom animations and ability effects for each hero.

Contents

  • 1 General information
  • 2 List
    • 2.1 Centaur Warrunner
    • 2.2 Clockwerk
    • 2.3 Crystal Maiden

  • 3 Priority
  • 4 Patch history

General information

  • Most Kinetic Gems come default on new cosmetic items purchased from the Dota 2 Store or unboxed from Treasures.
    • Items acquired through the item drop system may not come with default gems.
    • Items sold on the Steam Community Market are often stripped of gems.
  • If the gem is removed, that item loses any customizations bound to the gem.
  • Kinetic gems are hero-specific and will only work on the hero they are intended for.

List

  • Click on a gem's name to view its customizations.
  • Custom animations change the way a hero's model moves.
  • Custom effects change the particles of a hero's abilities.

Priority

  • Custom attack animations from gems stack. The hero will randomly select custom animations from all equipped gems.
  • Customizations may conflict when two or more Kinetic Gems are equipped. When this occurs, the following priority is followed:
    • [ Info Needed ]

Patch history

Patch
Description
14 Aug 2014
  • Mastery Gem function merged into Kinetic Gems.
  • All existing Mastery Gems have been converted to Kinetic Gems.
